Libru.description: Libru is a programming resource library built to allow self-taught developers to find, rate and review resources as well as track what courses, books, guides, etc they have completed, are working on, or want to do.

Draw-Dash.description: Draw-Dash is a competitive, 1v1 drawing competition. Authenticated users are given a prompt for what to draw and a timer begins to countdown, and the 60 second Draw Dash begins!

Mansion Men.description: This website was built for a long-running fantasy football league that I am a member of. It provides visualization of user and league statistical data, tracking of league trophy records, and reference for league rules and previosu draft results

Voting Application.description: This was built as a part of the FreeCodeCamp backend certification course. The goal was to build a full stack JavaScript app that is functionally similar to this: https://fcc-voting-arthow4n.herokuapp.com/ and deploy it to Heroku.

Pinterest Clone.description: This was built as a part of the FreeCodeCamp backend certification course.  Build a full stack JavaScript app that is functionally similar to this: https://midnight-dust.hyperdev.space and deploy it to Heroku.

Nightlife Application.description: This was built as a part of the FreeCodeCamp backend certification course.  Build a full stack JavaScript app that is functionally similar to this: http://whatsgoinontonight.herokuapp.com/ and deploy it to Heroku.

Bookster.description: This was built as a part of the FreeCodeCamp backend certification course. Build a full stack JavaScript app that is functionally similar to this: http://bookjump.herokuapp.com/ and deploy it to Heroku.

Simon Says.description: This was built as a part of the FreeCodeCamp frontend certification course. Build a CodePen.io app that is functionally similar to this: https://codepen.io/FreeCodeCamp/full/obYBjE.
